suite.name: Cart Tests

test.name: Verify a product can be added to the cart

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Log Message
kw.arg: Test adding a product to the cart started

kw.name: Get Current Date
kw.doc: Returns current local or UTC time with an optional increment.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: 2023-07-26 00:20:11 - INFO - Test adding a product to the cart started

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Append To File
kw.doc: Appends the given content to the specified file.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

kw.name: Log Message
kw.arg: Test adding a product to the cart finished

kw.name: Get Current Date
kw.doc: Returns current local or UTC time with an optional increment.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: 2023-07-26 00:20:12 - INFO - Test adding a product to the cart finished
